price: Ti Allāhu ni ìjọba àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀. Ó ń ṣàforíjìn fún ẹni tí Ó bá fẹ́. Ó sì ń jẹ ẹni tí Ó bá fẹ́ níyà.¹ Allāhu sì ń jẹ́ Aláforíjìn, Àṣàkẹ́-ọ̀run.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ يَغۡفِرُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا
footnotes: 1. “Ẹni tí Allāhu bá fẹ́” fún àforíjìn Rẹ̀, ó máa lè tọrọ àforíjìn lọ́dọ̀ Allāhu. “Ẹni tí Allāhu bá fẹ́ jẹ níyà” kò níí lè tọrọ àforíjìn lọ́dọ̀ Allāhu, kò sì níí ronú pìwàdà.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yaghfiru liman yashāu wayuʿadhibu man yashāu wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
